name: The Sims 3 Package File
summary: Learn about .SIMS3PACK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SIMS3PACK files may be created by anyone using a third-party Sims 3 package editor. When opened, content from a SIMS3PACK is directly imported into the game. Newly imported content is available the next time The Sims 3 is run.

description: Game package file created for The Sims 3, an open-ended life simulation game in which players manipulate a simulated environment with virtual people called "Sims;" contains visual data that represents any part of the virtual environment, such as "Sim" people, clothing, and buildings.
